sn33.55:1.2: “Vinnane kho, vaccha, appaccakkhakamma, vinnanasamudaye appaccakkhakamma, vinnananirodhe appaccakkhakamma, vinnananirodhagaminiya patipadaya appaccakkhakamma;
sn33.55:1.4: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va …pe…
sn33.55:1.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati vati.
sn33.55:1.6: Ayam kho, vaccha, hetu, ayam paccayo, yanimani anekavihitani ditthigatani loke uppajjanti—
sn33.55:1.7: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va, antava lokoti va, anantava lokoti va, tam jivam tam sariranti va, annam jivam annam sariranti va, hoti tathagato param maranati va, na hoti tathagato param maranati va, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param maranati va, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va”ti.
